current.notify_me_richtext: Notify me when this product is available:
current.about_program: To demonstrate how much we cherish our loyal customers, you can gain rewards in more ways than purchasing your favorite products.
current.referral_description: Here at our store, we firmly believe that sharing is caring. Invite your friends to our store and be rewarded for your referral!
current.spending_description: Now that you have some hard earned points, here's how you can spend them.
current.sm_question_1: How do I join Mielle Rewards?
current.sm_answer_1: It’s free to join, simply join here, or call us at 1-800-436-9165! You can also enroll when you register for a new Mielle account. All rewards program members must accept the Mielle Rewards Program Terms and Conditions before they can participate in Mielle Rewards, including redeeming Rewards Points for Rewards Codes or receiving any other Mielle Rewards benefits.
current.sm_question_2: Who is eligible to participate in Mielle Rewards?
current.sm_answer_2: You must be a United States resident who is at least 18 years old to participate in Mielle Rewards. Current Mielle employees and contractors, and their immediate family members living in the same household, are not eligible to participate in the Mielle Rewards Program. All eligible customers are more than welcome!
current.sm_question_3: How do I earn Rewards Points?
current.sm_answer_3: At this time, you can earn Rewards Points by making qualifying purchases on MielleOrganics.com, and writing eligible product reviews on MielleOrganics.com (for more information about how to earn product review based Rewards Points, please visit the Rewards Reviews Page). Keep your eyes open for new, fun ways to earn Rewards Points in the future!
current.sm_question_4: How can I use Rewards Points?
current.sm_answer_4: You can apply your Rewards Points toward future purchases on MielleOrganics.com. Every $1 will grant 5 reward points. You may also use your Rewards Points for other purposes as may be provided by Mielle from time to time. Rewards Points accumulated under the Mielle Rewards Program are promotional in nature and have no cash value.
current.sm_question_5: How can I see my Rewards Point balance?
current.sm_answer_5: You can view your Rewards Point balance by logging into your Mielle account and visiting your account page. You'll also periodically get a Rewards Point balance email from us.
current.sm_question_6: Is there a limit on how many Rewards Points I can earn?
current.sm_answer_6: There is no limit on the number of Rewards Points you can earn by making qualifying purchases but there IS a limit on the total number of Rewards Points you can earn by participating in all other qualifying opportunities to earn Rewards Points, such as creating your account on MielleOrganics.com, writing eligible product reviews, etc. We refer to these qualifying opportunities to earn bonus Rewards Points (including any other qualifying opportunities to earn bonus Rewards Points that we may offer you in the future) as “Promotional Activities.” You can only earn a maximum of 50,000 Rewards Points per calendar year for participating in Promotional Activities. Once you have earned 50,000 Rewards Points for participating in Promotional Activities in a calendar year, you may continue to participate in Promotional Activities but you will not receive Rewards Points for your participation.
current.sm_question_7: When will my earned Rewards Points be reflected in my account?
current.sm_answer_7: We do our best to award Rewards Points earned for qualifying purchases to your Rewards Program Account within 24 hours of purchase. Rewards Points earned for eligible participation in Promotional Activities may take 7 or more days to be added to your Rewards Program Account.
current.sm_question_8: Why do I have a negative Rewards Point balance?
current.sm_answer_8: If you void a purchase or return your purchase, Mielle will deduct the Rewards Points that you were awarded for that purchase from your Rewards Program Account. If you have already redeemed those Rewards Points, this could potentially result in a negative Rewards Point balance in your Rewards Program Account.
current.sm_question_9: Does spending my points change my status?
current.sm_answer_9: Spending Your Points Doesn’t Change Your Status: So redeem away! Just because you redeem them doesn’t mean you’ll lower your reward status. Just remember that your reward points and level will reset at the end of each year if you have made enough tier earning purchases.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.newsletter_text: Join our community and be the first to receive exclusive news on product offers, limited editions and special sale promotions from Mielle.

settings.title: What are Single-Strand Knots and How to Prevent Them?
settings.text: Throughout my natural hair journey, I’ve experienced single-strand knots, especially when I do not stretch my hair to style. What causes them?

settings.title: 7 Reasons Why Your Natural Hair Isn't Growing
settings.text: Unless there’s some medical issue that prevents your follicles from producing new hair, your strands are always growing. So what’s going on?

settings.title: Should You REALLY be Sleeping in Your Deep Conditioner?
settings.text: Deep conditioning is probably the most important step in the hair care routine! But should you really be sleeping in your deep conditioner?

settings.title: Our products are also available at
We believe that healthier ingredients allow you to experience healthier hair.
settings.text: That's exactly why we've created natural hair care products specific to your hair type! Since launching in 2014, Mielle's natural hair products have taken the hair care market by storm! From moisturizing shampoo to hair oil, each natural ingredient used in our hair care products is chosen with delicate care. With a heavy emphasis and focus on health from the inside out, we continue to provide you a line of natural beauty products for every natural hair type. Founder and CEO, Monique Rodriguez, has over nine years experience as a registered nurse. She is passionate about sharing her regimen of tailbone-length, healthy hair and inspiring women in business and entrepreneurship.
